title: The AMU-UEDIN Submission to the WMT16 News Translation Task: Attention-based NMT Models as Feature Functions in Phrase-based SMT
abstract: This paper describes the AMU-UEDIN submissions to the WMT 2016 shared task on news translation. We explore methods of decode-time integration of attention-based neural translation models with phrase-based statistical machine translation. Efficient batch-algorithms for GPU-querying are proposed and implemented. For English-Russian, the phrase-based system cannot surpass state-of-the-art stand-alone neural models. For the Russian-English task, our submission achieves the top BLEU result, outperforming the best pure-neural system by 1.1 BLEU points and our own phrase-based baseline by 1.6 BLEU. In follow-up experiments we improve these results by additional 0.7 BLEU.
